connector.function: after on-center/off-center edge extraction and zipping 100:1
levator palpebrae superioris, the inferior oblique, and the superior, medial, and inferior rectus muscles
superior oblique, rotation in a vertical plane – looking down and up, rotation in the plane of the face
lateral rectus, quick turn to the right -> compensatory reflex turning of two eyes to the left
connector.notes: vestibular nucleus -> PPRF -> ABD -> this, larger motor neurons, c.n. VI

connector.function: to ciliary muscle to accomodate eye

connector.notes: sphincter pupillae is situated along the edge of the iris contracts to close the opening in the pupil
connector.function: to sphincter pupillae to close pupil

connector.notes: dilator pupillae runs radially, like the spokes of a wheel, through the iris, and when it contracts this opens the pupil
connector.function: to dilator pupillae to open pupil
